alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:23AM AKST until March 11 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST FRIDAY NORTH OF GAKONA... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, with localized amounts up to 15 inches. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slippery roads and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through tonight, especially through Isabel Pass. Light and intermittent snow will then continue through Friday afternoon. If you must travel, plan extra time and carry an emergency kit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
